post.image_prompt: The image is a close-up shot of the new Huda Beauty Aloe Vera Skin Balm. The balm is housed in a small, round, frosted glass jar with a minimalist white label featuring the Huda Beauty logo in a delicate, sans-serif font. The background is a soft, diffused light green, mimicking the soothing color of aloe vera. Several fresh aloe vera leaves are artfully arranged around the jar, some sliced open to reveal the clear, gel-like pulp. The lighting is soft and natural, creating a dewy and fresh feel. The composition is clean and modern, focusing on the product and its key ingredient. The overall mood is calming and refreshing, emphasizing the hydrating and soothing benefits of the balm. The image aims for a high-end, luxurious feel, consistent with the Huda Beauty brand aesthetic. The focus is sharp on the jar and aloe vera, with a slight bokeh effect in the background to draw the viewer's eye. The color palette is primarily green and white, with subtle hints of other natural tones to create a visually appealing and harmonious image.

queryUsed: I want a post that show cases our newest product of aloe vera based skin balm.
